title: (x) Xerox logo - custom designed {Mark S}
content: I'd be very surprised if it isn't a custom font. However you can get a similar feel from [Peignot](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224937/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/peignot/) or [Optima](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224937/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/optima/).
author: pattyfab

comments.content:
I agree this is most likely a custom job, but it certainly has some similarities with Mollenstadt's [Signata](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516224937/http:/www.philsfonts.com/detail.html?sku=BQ90139007P1). Maybe a cross between that and Piegnot?   
   
 -t

The Xerox logo is a custom design and has been around since at least the eighties. Lettering artist Ray Cruz also did a whole alphabet based on it which they have used in their ads, but it is only for their use.
